title: High Ping after the update
body:
been getting only 200-400 ping 

Any idea to fix this

Game is unplayable

replies.body: Your network might be having a hard time reaching our servers for one reason or another. Without having much more context as to what's going on when that ping spikes it's hard to troubleshoot, but we should be able to hit the most common solutions with our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues). Hit me back if that doesn't help!
